mapper.sql: id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguageId, softwareSize, updateDate, devUserId, appIntroduction, statusId, frameId, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, firstAPPClassId, twoAPPClassId, threeAPPClassId, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId
mapper.select: SELECT app.id "appId", app.softwareName "softwareName", app.APKName "APKName", app.supportROM "supportROM", app.interfaceLanguageId "interfaceLanguageId", app.softwareSize "softwareSize", app.updateDate "updateDate", app.devUserId "devUserId", app.appIntroduction "appIntroduction", app.statusId "statusId", app.frameId "frameId", app.onSaleDate "onSaleDate", app.offSaleDate "offSaleDate", app.flatformId "flatformId", app.downloads "downloads", app.createdBy "createdBy", app.creationDate "creationDate", app.firstAPPClassId "firstAPPClassId", app.twoAPPClassId "twoAPPClassId", app.threeAPPClassId "threeAPPClassId", app.logoPicPath "logoPicPath", app.logoLocPath "logoLocPath", app.versionId "versionId", dev.devName "devUserName", devtwo.devName "createByName", st.statusType "statusType", fr.frameType "frameType", ff.flatformName "flatformName", fa.firstAPPName "firstAPPName", ta.twoAPPName "twoAPPName", tha.threeAPPName "threeAPPName", av.versionNo "versionNo" FROM appInfos app, devUser dev, devUser devtwo, `STATUS` st, frame fr, flatform ff, firstappclass fa, twoAppClass ta, threeAPPClass tha, appVersion av WHERE app.devUserId = dev.id AND app.statusId = st.id AND app.frameId = fr.id AND app.flatformId = ff.id AND app.createdBy = devtwo.id AND app.firstAPPClassId = fa.id AND app.twoAPPClassId = ta.id AND app.threeAPPClassId = tha.id AND app.versionId = av.id AND app.id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into appinfos (id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguageId, softwareSize, updateDate, devUserId, appIntroduction, statusId, frameId, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, firstAPPClassId, twoAPPClassId, threeAPPClassId, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfacelanguageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{softwaresize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{devuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appintroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frameid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flatformid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloads,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstappclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twoappclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{threeappclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logopicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logolocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update appinfos
softwareName = #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APKName = #{apkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

offSaleDate = #{offsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
